page.title: 11THE CHAIN LETTER
page.content: On Monday the 17th June 1985 Richard Bower received a letter from his cousin who lives in Canada in a place called Saskatchewen.This area of Canada is 3,851,809 sq miles.When Richard got the letter it said "This chain letter has been going on since 1975 to 1985. We are trying to get it to 1986 to get into the Guiness Book of Records".It started in Germany 10 years ago.After 24 days you receive 50 postcards from all over the world.Here are some people who are also involved in this record breaking attempt.Micheal Kenly,Stephanie Payne,Shauna Sabo,Laurisa Osheski,Shelley Griffiths and Rachel Hayward.These people all live in Canada.Rachel Hayward is Richard's cousin.
